item.description:
THE HOLY GRAIL is the wholly fictitious and slanderous account of the untold adventures of the Knights of The Round Table ? never has King Arthur been so thoroughly insulted.

The Knights who say Ni.
Brave Sir Robin
He Who Crosses the Bridge of Death

and the uber classic Trojan Rabbit


Whether you've never seen this fillm, or whether you can recite every line, you owe it to yourself to enjoy an evening of Monty Python at the Brattle, followed by hilarious discussion of all things Python at a locality in Harvard Square.

As is our custom, John will be standing at the exit banging two empty halves of coconut together.

Tickets: $7.50 / $6 seniors/children<12; All Day Pass $25 / $20 members. Senior/Child tickets and Member Passes availableonly at
item.how_to_find_us: I will be standing at the Exit with two empty halves of coconut which I will be banging together.
item.why: Good idea? Of course it is a good idea!
item.name: Monty Python and the Holy Grail
